I'm a 24 year old Nigerian male who is gay and suffers with anxiety constantly.
I'm a 19 year old first-year student who feels overwhelmed by exams, has trouble sleeping, and finds it hard to relax even when I have free time.
I'm a 35 year old new parent who often feels irritable and exhausted, and I get frustrated because I can’t seem to enjoy things like I used to.
I'm a 28 year old who recently moved to a new city and feels lonely, has trouble motivating myself to go out, and worries that people are judging me.
I'm a 42 year old dealing with chronic stress at work, frequent headaches, and I notice myself snapping at people and drinking more than I’d like.
I'm a 23 year old who procrastinates and avoids starting tasks because I’m scared of failing, and then I feel guilty afterwards.
I'm a 31 year old who keeps having sudden physical sensations like racing heart and dizziness that make me worry something is seriously wrong.
I'm a 50 year old who feels down most days, has lost interest in hobbies, and struggles to get out of bed in the morning.
I'm a 27 year old who constantly seeks reassurance from friends, and I panic when they don't reply quickly because I worry I've done something wrong.
I'm a 46 year old who has intrusive thoughts I know are irrational, but I can’t stop checking and re-checking things to feel safe.
